Author: thalidimide
Text: > how bad can taking laxatives daily actually be?  [If you really wanna know, it can lead to dependence on lax for a bowel movement (meaning you can't poop at all without them - hella GI problems) and electrolyte imbalances that can cause all kinds of problems (mainly heart problems). ](https://www.mayoclinic.org/diseases-conditions/constipation/in-depth/laxatives/art-20045906) They have reason to be worried if they care about you.
